name: Constellation Tango (itch)
description:
:
We are one of the 10 UBC Game Dev teams for the 2020-2021 year. We are the smallest team, and are made up of entirely new to game development students. Yet despite this obstacle, we still plan on creating a strong game!

OUR TEAM:

Bennett: Programming - Level Creation

Duy: Audio

Gwen: Project Lead

Jackson: Art

Julia: Programming - Galaxy Map and Level Selection

Matthew: Programming - Combat Systems

Richard: Writing

Tom: Programming - AI Behaviour

Special Thanks: Koda, the UBC Game Dev club.

FUTURE PLANS:
This is a growing list, and is not conclusive. These are just some of the plans:
- Multiple Worlds
- Better Camera Control
- Unit Select
- Boss Encounters
- Quick Warp on Galaxy Map
